channel.title: Ffmpeg on My Awesome Site
channel.description: Recent content in Ffmpeg on My Awesome Site

item.title: MPV: A Free, Open Source, and Cross-platform Media Player.
item.author: wildanpastioke@gmail.com (Wildan)
item.description: A tiny but powerful (and super useful of course) video (and music) player.

item.title: FFmpeg - Convert Any Video Format to MP4
item.author: wildanpastioke@gmail.com (Wildan)
item.description: If you have ffmpeg installed on your Linux machine, then it actually could help you to convert any video format to MP4!

item.title: Mystiq - FFmpeg's GUI
item.author: wildanpastioke@gmail.com (Wildan)
item.description: Do you know FFmpeg? This is the GUI version of it. (If you don’t like FFmpeg CLI version, this is the your right choice!)

item.title: FFmpeg - Convert MP4 to GIF
item.author: wildanpastioke@gmail.com (Wildan)
item.description: My simple note in regards of converting video (MP4) to GIF.

item.title: Screen Recorder with FFmpeg
item.author: wildanpastioke@gmail.com (Wildan)
item.description: My simple note in regards of screen recording using ffmpeg.
